TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Pololan, title = Pololan, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pololan} }

S.FORM: Pololan Itiniay i Jianshi Cen no Hsinchu ko Pololan a niyaro', 48 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 188 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 93% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 175 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 7% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 13 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal92%, Saysiyat1%, roma1%.

Pololan Itiniay i Jianshi Cen no Hsincho ko Pololan a niyaro', 48 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 188 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 93% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 175 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 7% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 13 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal92%, Saysiyat1%, roma1%.
